name: Laps Tournaments
description:
Challenge online players in Laps Tournaments and win cash prizes!

This eSports - styled version of Laps is supported by the Skillz platform and allows you to compete against online players.

In Laps, the goal is to match together tiles of similar color and maximize your score by connecting the highest numbers possible.
Being addicting and replayable, you will enjoy this competitive puzzle game while earning money from your triumphs.Features

• eSports - styled system supported by Skillz.
• Cash Prizes from online pro-tournaments.
• Competitive Leagues Available.
• Fast-paced gameplay.
• An original & simple experience.
